timeline.bodyText:
I'd prefer this to be:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                    SamlServiceProvider sp = idp.getRegisteredServiceProviders().get(request.getSpEntityId());
          
          
            
                    SamlServiceProvider sp = idp.getRegisteredServiceProvider(request.getSpEntityId());
          
      
    
    
  

I don't think we want to rely on the IdP object always representing the SPs as a Map.
There may be millions of SPs and we don't want to have to load all of them into memory.
Eventually we'll probably need to make that method async, but for now separating this code from the underlying implentation is a start.
